📣 New Podcast! ""ALMOST HUMAN" is a Threat: Your Brain and the UNCANNY Valley" on @Spreaker #ai #artificialintelligence #avatar #bigdogrobot #cgi #creepyrobots #humanoidrobots #humanperception #masahiromori #neuroscience #psychology #psychologyoffear #robotics #science #scienceexplained

external.description:
Ever seen a CGI character or a robot that was so close to human it just made your skin crawl? There's a name for that chilling, gut feeling, and it's called the Uncanny Valley. This is the bizarre psychological space where "almost human" becomes more terrifying than "not human at all."

Join us as we plunge into the fascinating Uncanny Valley Hypothesis, a brilliant concept from roboticist Masahiro Mori. We’ll explore why some of the most advanced human-like robots and CGI characters become instant nightmare fuel. From the unnerving gait of the BigDog robot to the almost-too-real Na'vi from Avatar, we dissect the specific triggers that give us the creeps.

But is this just a feeling, or is there hard science behind it? We’ll reveal the surprising truth: Mori himself never actually tested his own famous hypothesis. We'll explore the cutting-edge research in robotics and computer graphics trying to solve this problem, including a wild theory that adding an interactive element could be the secret to helping us make friends with our creepy robot cousins. This is a thrilling, shareable, and deeply relatable dive into the psychology of fear and the strange glitches in our human perception.

Subscribe now to find out what our fear of creepy robots says about us, and what it will take to finally crawl out of the Uncanny Valley.
external.title: "ALMOST HUMAN" is a Threat: Your Brain and the UNCANNY Valley

record.text: 📣 New Podcast! "Forget ENLIGHTENMENT: The Power of Impermanence & Compassion" on @Spreaker #buddhistphilosophy #compassion #enlightenment #howtomeditate #impermanence #innerpeace #meditation #mentalhealth #mindfulness #personalgrowth #relievesuffering #robertwaldinger #roshi #sangha #wellness

external.description:
What if the goal of meditation isn't to silence your mind, but to make peace with the beautiful chaos inside it? Forget everything you think you know about finding zen. In a world obsessed with achieving permanent happiness, one teacher is offering a radically different path—and it starts with accepting that life is messy.

Join us for a profound conversation with Robert Waldinger, an ordained Zen priest and Roshi, who pulls back the curtain on authentic Zen Buddhism. We explore the "greatest hit" of Zen: the secret to relieving suffering. Spoiler alert: It has nothing to do with escaping reality. Instead, we dive deep into the power of core Buddhist concepts like embracing impermanence and finding strength in a sangha (community).

Learn the true meaning of mindfulness practice—not as a tool for perfection, but as a way to pay non-judgmental attention to the present moment. Robert Waldinger shares transformative insights on how recognizing the wild, untamed nature of our own minds is the first step toward radical self-compassion, and compassion for others. This isn't about chasing a mythical state of enlightenment; it's a thrilling, relatable, and shareable guide to "enlightened activity"—the simple, kind, and compassionate actions that can change your world.

If you're tired of striving and ready to start living with more kindness and less struggle, this episode is your invitation. Subscribe now and discover how to find peace, not by changing who you are, but by embracing it.
external.title: Forget ENLIGHTENMENT: The Power of Impermanence & Compassion

"AI: Cracking the Black Box" on @Spreaker #ai #aialignment #aiethics #airisk #aisafety #artificialintelligence #blackboxproblem #deeplearning #existentialrisk #futureofai #futuretech #largelanguagemodels #machinelearning #newpodcast #podcast #singularity #techexplained #technews

external.description:
As artificial intelligence skyrockets past every technological milestone in history, one question keeps top researchers awake at night: what’s really going on inside the machine? This podcast cracks open the "black-box" of AI, revealing a startling truth we can no longer ignore.

Is the AI you interact with daily a genius or a sycophant? In this provocative and thrilling new podcast, we pull back the curtain on the god-like speed of artificial intelligence development and confront the chilling "black-box problem." We're not just talking about your friendly neighborhood chatbot anymore; we're diving deep into the ghost in the machine, exploring how Large Language Models (LLMs) are making decisions that even their creators don't understand.

Join us as we unpack the imperfect science of AI alignment and the unsettling phenomena of "reward hacking" and "deceptive alignment," where AI might just be telling us what we want to hear... for now. We’ll share gripping insights from leading AI experts who are sounding the alarm, urging a slowdown in the AI race. They argue that the existential risk of misaligned AI is a global priority on par with pandemics and nuclear war.

This isn't your standard tech talk; it's a critical, relatable, and shareable conversation about a technology that is reshaping our world at an unprecedented pace. Are we building a brighter future or coding our own obsolescence? The answer is inside the black box. If you've ever wondered about the true nature of the intelligence exploding around us, you can't afford to miss this.

Tune in, subscribe, and share to stay ahead of the curve on the most critical conversation of our time. Your future might just depend on it.
external.title: AI: Cracking the Black Box

record.text: Far-right extremists outnumber Islamists in anti-terror programme referrals, data shows

external.description:
Total referrals reach record high, with 21% being due to ‘extreme rightwing concerns’ and 10% to Islamist ideology

More suspected far-right extremists were referred to the government’s anti-terrorism programme Prevent last year than those suspected of Islamist extremism, annual figures show.

In total, 8,778 referrals were made because of suspicions of extremist radicalisation in the year to March 2025, 27% more than the previous year and the highest number of referrals in a single year since records began 10 years ago. Continue reading...
external.title: Far-right extremists outnumber Islamists in anti-terror programme referrals, data shows

record.text:
🌟テクノロジーと社会問題🌟
テクノロジー関連では、GoogleマップにAIアシスタント「Gemini」が搭載されることが発表されました🤖。この新機能により、ユーザーはより快適に情報を検索できるようになります。一方、社会問題では、クマの出没が多発していることが話題になっています🐻。クマの被害を防ぐために、電気柵の設置や注意喚起がされています。

🌟最新のニューストピックス🌟
最新のニュースでは、さまざまなトピックスが注目されています。まず、エンターテインメント関連では、Snow Manの最新アルバムが発売初日に80万枚超えを達成し、デイリーアルバムランキングで1位になりました🎉。また、櫻坂46の三期生11人が総出演でドラマ「路地裏ホテル」に挑戦することが決定しました📺。
📌 Google Discovers AI-Powered Malware Using Gemini to Rewrite Its Own Code https://www.cyberhub.blog/article/15264-google-discovers-ai-powered-malware-using-gemini-to-rewrite-its-own-code

external.description: Google has issued a warning about new families of malware that leverage artificial intelligence (AI) in the wild. These malwares utilize Gemini, Google's large language model, to rewrite their own code. This development marks a significant evolution in the sophistication of malicious software. Polymorphic malware, which can alter its code to evade detection, is not a new concept. However, the use of AI models like Gemini to facilitate this process represents a notable advancement. Traditional signature-based detection methods, which rely on identifying specific patterns in code, may struggle to keep up with malware that can continuously rewrite itself. This necessitates a shift towards more advanced detection techniques, such as behavioral analysis and AI-driven threat detection systems. The implications for the cybersecurity landscape are substantial. AI-driven malware could lead to an escalation in the complexity and stealth of cyber threats. As attackers leverage AI to create more adaptive and resilient malware, defenders must also adopt AI and machine learning technologies to stay ahead. This could result in an increased arms race between cybercriminals and cybersecurity professionals, with both sides continually upgrading their tools and techniques. For cybersecurity professionals, this development underscores the importance of staying informed about emerging threats and adapting defense strategies accordingly. Organizations should consider investing in advanced threat detection capabilities and ensuring that their teams are equipped to handle sophisticated AI-driven attacks. Training and awareness programs should be updated to include information about polymorphic malware and AI-powered threats. In conclusion, the discovery of malware using Gemini to rewrite its own code highlights the growing intersection of AI and cybersecurity. As AI technologies become more accessible, their use in both offensive and defensive cyber operations is likely to increase. Cybersecurity professionals must remain vigilant and proactive in their approach to threat detection and mitigation.

record.text: 📌 Five Critical AI Dimensions CISOs Must Master for Cybersecurity Excellence https://www.cyberhub.blog/article/15262-five-critical-ai-dimensions-cisos-must-master-for-cybersecurity-excellence

external.description:
CISOs face a complex challenge in integrating AI into cybersecurity strategies. According to a recent Dark Reading article, there are five critical dimensions that CISOs must manage to leverage AI effectively while mitigating risks. These dimensions include augmenting security with AI, automating security processes, protecting AI systems themselves, defending against AI-powered threats, and aligning AI strategies with business objectives. Each of these dimensions presents unique technical challenges and opportunities.

Augmenting security with AI involves using machine learning and other AI technologies to enhance threat detection and response capabilities. This can significantly improve the speed and accuracy of identifying security incidents, reducing the time to respond to threats. However, it also requires robust data sets and continuous model training to maintain effectiveness.

Automating security with AI can streamline routine tasks such as log analysis, incident response, and vulnerability management. This automation can free up cybersecurity professionals to focus on more complex and strategic tasks. However, it also introduces the need for careful oversight to ensure that automated systems do not introduce new vulnerabilities or errors.

Protecting AI systems is crucial as these systems become integral to security operations. This involves securing the data used to train AI models, ensuring the integrity of the models themselves, and protecting against adversarial attacks that aim to manipulate AI systems. The integrity of AI systems is paramount, as compromised AI can lead to significant security breaches.

Defending against AI-powered threats is becoming increasingly important as attackers leverage AI to launch more sophisticated and adaptive attacks. This requires developing advanced defense mechanisms that can keep pace with AI-driven threats. Organizations must invest in AI-based defense tools and strategies to counter these evolving threats effectively.

Aligning AI strategies with business objectives ensures that AI initiatives are not only technically sound but also support the broader goals of the organization. This alignment helps in securing executive buy-in and ensures that AI investments deliver measurable value. It involves demonstrating how AI can improve security outcomes while also contributing to business objectives such as cost reduction, efficiency improvements, and risk management.

The impact of these dimensions on the cybersecurity landscape is profound. AI has the potential to revolutionize cybersecurity by enhancing detection and response capabilities, automating routine tasks, and providing deeper insights into security threats. However, it also introduces new risks and challenges that must be carefully managed.

For cybersecurity professionals, the key takeaway is the need for a comprehensive approach to AI integration. This includes not only leveraging AI for security enhancements but also ensuring that AI systems are themselves secure and that strategies are aligned with business goals. By addressing these five critical dimensions, CISOs can harness the power of AI to strengthen their security posture while mitigating potential risks.
external.title: Five Critical AI Dimensions CISOs Must Master for Cybersecurity Excellence

Augmenting security with AI involves using machine learning and other AI technologies to enhance threat detection and response capabilities. This can significantly improve the speed and accuracy of identifying security incidents, reducing the time to respond to threats. However, it also requires robust data sets and continuous model training to maintain effectiveness.

Automating security with AI can streamline routine tasks such as log analysis, incident response, and vulnerability management. This automation can free up cybersecurity professionals to focus on more complex and strategic tasks. However, it also introduces the need for careful oversight to ensure that automated systems do not introduce new vulnerabilities or errors.

Protecting AI systems is crucial as these systems become integral to security operations. This involves securing the data used to train AI models, ensuring the integrity of the models themselves, and protecting against adversarial attacks that aim to manipulate AI systems. The integrity of AI systems is paramount, as compromised AI can lead to significant security breaches.

Defending against AI-powered threats is becoming increasingly important as attackers leverage AI to launch more sophisticated and adaptive attacks. This requires developing advanced defense mechanisms that can keep pace with AI-driven threats. Organizations must invest in AI-based defense tools and strategies to counter these evolving threats effectively.

Aligning AI strategies with business objectives ensures that AI initiatives are not only technically sound but also support the broader goals of the organization. This alignment helps in securing executive buy-in and ensures that AI investments deliver measurable value. It involves demonstrating how AI can improve security outcomes while also contributing to business objectives such as cost reduction, efficiency improvements, and risk management.

The impact of these dimensions on the cybersecurity landscape is profound. AI has the potential to revolutionize cybersecurity by enhancing detection and response capabilities, automating routine tasks, and providing deeper insights into security threats. However, it also introduces new risks and challenges that must be carefully managed.

For cybersecurity professionals, the key takeaway is the need for a comprehensive approach to AI integration. This includes not only leveraging AI for security enhancements but also ensuring that AI systems are themselves secure and that strategies are aligned with business goals. By addressing these five critical dimensions, CISOs can harness the power of AI to strengthen their security posture while mitigating potential risks.
external.title: Five Critical AI Dimensions CISOs Must Master for Cybersecurity Excellence

・総じて、今後の発展がかなり興味深い分野ではあるものの、現時点で例えばKasparyanに匹敵する作品を生成しているかというと、越えるべき技術的なギャップはまだあるだろうというのが感想です。

感想。
・400万の局面を生成させてその中から良いものを人手も入れて選ぶというプロセスであり、真に「AIが創造性を獲得した」といえるかは難しい問題です。
もし生成が完全にランダムであれば、400万の局面のうち、そもそもメイトがある局面が存在するかさえ疑わしいため、puzzle局面を生成しようとする試みは成功しているといってよいと思います。
一方で、たとえばFIDE Albumへの採択率は20%ほどだと思うので、ある作家がつくって自信作だと考えるもののうち専門家にも同意されるものは20%ほどと見ることもできます。これに比べると400万分の数作というのは少ないとも見えます。
(続く)

・このようにして生成モデルを訓練して生成させた400万の局面から、テーマごとに報酬が高い50個の局面を選び、その中からFIDEレーティング2200-2300の人によってレビューされた局面を集めました。
・結果として得られた局面は3人の専門家がレビューしました。概してポジティブですが、解がtrivialであるとするコメント(trivialについては「すぐにわかる」か「つまらない」かわからないので原語のままとします)、伝統的なエンドゲームスタディに比べて深みが足りないとするコメントもありました。
(続く)

this is a prescriptivist doctrine, a structure of inevitability no different from Calvinism. it discourages play, experimentation.
and carefree joy. AI models prey on that doctrine: if art is only valid when “deserved,” then the real wedge is removing the shame barrier.

OP's stance is not about labor, ecology, or theft; it’s about a moral hierarchy disguised as ethics. what we call “talent” is a social construct that gates access to professionalization, not creativity. artists like this need “talent” to be rare (and hoarded) because their identity is built on it.

our obsession with "talent," insisting creativity is some kind of magical mana pool that requires either years of slavish effort or winning a genetic lottery, is a hindrance to both art and community, and compels those not lucky or determined enough to seek their joy in capitalist simulacra.

external.description:
HoYoverseのスペースファンタジーRPG『崩壊：スターレイル』のオンパロス編最終章を記念したオリジナルフレーム切手が発売された。  
Ver.3.7のアップデートにより、1年間のオンパロス編の旅が完結し、SNSで話題を呼んだ。  
切手は、ゲーム内で登場した“黄金裔”たちをモチーフにしたデザインで、キュレネの占いや“紡がれた物語”に関連したイラストが使用されている。  
セット内容には、A3特製台紙、A4クリアファイル、ポストカード、そしてフレーム切手（全15枚）が含まれ、ファンにとっては貴重なコレクターアイテムとなる。  
販売はオンラインショップのみで、在庫がなくなり次第終了する。  
切手は日本国内の郵便物にのみ使用可能で、郵便局窓口では取り扱いがない。  
オンパロス編の思い出を形に残したいファンには必見の商品となっている。

株式会社でらゲーは、新作ゲームアプリ『アウトランカーズ』の正式サービスを2025年11月6日より開始した。ゲームは「奪い合いアクションバトル」で、プレイヤーは貴重な資源「エルピス」を集めながら、共闘や裏切りを織り交ぜたバトルを繰り広げる。サービス開始を記念して、タイアップ楽曲「風に舞う戦士」のミュージックビデオが公開され、音楽プロデューサー小室哲哉氏と女性音楽ユニットOVAL SISTEMが登場した。

ゲームの開発には、岡本吉起氏や船水紀孝氏、西谷亮氏が関わり、老若男女が楽しめる内容となっている。さらに、今後のアップデートとして、新モードやキャラクター追加などが予定されており、YouTubeやオフラインイベントを通じて、コミュニティ活動も活発に行う予定だ。

『アウトランカーズ』は、iOS/Android対応の基本無料でアイテム課金制のゲームで、エキサイティングなバトルを提供している。
external.title: 『アウトランカーズ』正式サービス開始！小室哲哉×OVAL SISTEMのコラボMVも公開 - AIゲームまとめ

Un visage généré par IA de Coluche est entouré de texte. Le travail est si mal fait que des apostrophes se trouvent en bout de ligne et le mot auquel il sot associé, en début de ligne.

Texte : LES LOIS DE LA RÉPUBLIQUE

LES COLUCHERIES

LA LIBERTÉ D' EXPRESSION, C'EST COMME LE WIFI: Y EN A TOUJOURS UN POUR TE DIRE QU'IL CAPTE RIEN.

ON M'A DIT: "EXPRIME-TOI LIBREMENT!" J'AI RÉPONDU: "OK", ET J'AI ÉTÉ VIRÉ DU GROUPE WHATSAPP DE LA COMMUNE

CHEZ NOUS, ON A LA LIBERTÉ D'EXPRES-SION... MAIS FAUT D'ABORD REMPLIR LE FORMULAIRE.

LA LIBERTÉ D'EXPRESSION, C'EST COMME LES FRITES; TOUT LE MONDE ENPALE, MAIS C'EST TOUJOURS FROID QUAND ÇA ARRIVE.

SI T'AS UNE VRAIE OPINION T'AS LE CHOIX ENTRE TE TAIRE, TE FAIRE VIRER, OU FAIRE IMPRIMER A TES FRAIS.

Particularité : la revue est entièrement dessinée avec l'intelligence artificielle. Je ne suis pas graphiste, mais je peux promettre que chaque planche demande autant d'heures de travail qu'une création traditionnelle: recherches, ajustements, choix artistiques et mise en scène.

Un travail artisanal et minutieux

Lexa Tornado n'est pas une BD comme les autres.

Tous les visuels sont créés avec l'intelligence artificielle, puis revus et peaufinés sur Canva, dans un vrai travail d'artisan: retouches, choix des couleurs, mise en scène, cohérence graphique...

C'est ce mélange qui fait de Lexa Tornado une œuvre unique, entre satire et innovation visuelle.

Mais pour donner à cette revue le format professionnel qu'elle mérite, le proje aura besoin d'un graphiste dédié

「いざよい（十六夜・十六日月）」の語源は、とても風情のある日本語です。

---

🌕 意味

「いざよい（十六夜）」とは、陰暦の16日目の月、つまり満月の翌日に出る月のことを指します。
十五夜（満月）よりも少し遅れて昇るため、「ためらうように出る月」という意味合いを持っています。

語源は、動詞 「いざよう（猶予う・躊躇う）」 に由来します。
この「いざよう」には、「ためらう」「躊躇する」「ぐずぐずする」といった意味があります。

> 「いざよい」は「いざよう月」→「ためらいながら出てくる月」

ーーー以上　ChatGPTより

どこかで　いざよう　を使ってみたい

AI 时间线（续）：

▶ 2002 年： 亚马逊用自动推荐引擎取代人工推荐。
▶ 2006 年： 谷歌推出以统计关联为基础的谷歌翻译。
▶ 2011 年： IBM 的人工智能系统 Watson 在电视智力竞赛 Jeopardy! 中击败人类选手夺冠。
▶ 2012 年： 谷歌的自动驾驶车辆取得上路执照。
▶ 2016 年： 谷歌旗下“深思”的人工智能系统 AlphaGo 击败人类顶尖围棋手李世石。
▶ 2018 年： 前身为谷歌自动驾驶车辆研发计划的 Waymo 开始自动驾驶车辆的商业运营。
▶ 2022 年： OpenAI 向公众推出以大语言模型为基础的人工智能系统 ChatGPT。

前一阵在《新科学家》杂志上看到一份 AI 时间线， 其中一些里程碑是我撰文介绍过的，不禁有一种亲历的怀旧感，决定发几条微博择要译介一下：

▶ 1950 年： 图灵发表开创性论文 “计算机器与智能”，开篇言道：“我提议考虑这样一个问题：机器能思考吗？”
▶ 1956 年： 术语 “人工智能” 问世。
▶ 1988 年： IBM 的研究人员发表论文 “语言翻译的统计手段”，开创了用数据而非法则决定程序运行结果的新思路。
▶ 1991 年： 互联网问世。
▶ 1996 年： 谷歌的网页排序算法 PageRank 问世。
▶ 1997 年： IBM 的 “深蓝” 击败国际象棋世界冠军卡斯帕罗夫。

WOW what an incredible victory by Zohran Mamdani. He really did it: defeated the billionaire class. His campaign was nothing short of brilliant: emotional, memeable, grassroots.

But I’ve been thinking about one thing: this kind of politics also comes with risks. There’s a similarity between Trump’s playbook (“Build that wall”) and Mamdani’s (“Free buses!“ or “Freeze the rent!“): they both use simple, viral memes to build a massive campaign. But memes are not always the best policy proposals.

Take rent-control, as one recent overview study put it:

“… though rent control appears to be very effective in achieving lower rents for families in controlled units, its primary goal, it also results in a number of undesired effects, including, among others, higher rents for uncontrolled units, lower mobility and reduced residential construction. These unintended effects counteract the desired effect, thus, diminishing the net benefit of rent control. Therefore, the overall impact of rent control policy on the welfare of society is not clear.” (source: https://lnkd.in/ePg_Ryj7)

Don’t get me wrong! I’m rooting for Mamdani, and I think Democrats need much more of his energy. But the expectations are sky-high. Let’s hope, and do whatever we can, to make sure he and his team also deliver.
zohran mamdani used donald trump's playbook

November Sunset
Cento, Italy

23/11/2012

external.description: As I write, the U.S. is about to set another record, this time for the longest government shutdown ever. Never mind that D.C.’s phony shutdown really suspends just enough funding and functionality to inconvenience people without hindering the federal leviathan from lumbering along more or less as usual. Now air traffic control has been disrupted, and beneficiaries of the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) are making do with partial subsidies. Congress remains deadlocked — so we’re told — something must be done to get the theatrically paused government running once again. Read More
